text: Geislingen an der Steige is a town in Göppingen in Baden-Württemberg in Germany. == Twin towns == Geislingen is twinned with: * Bischofswerda, Saxony, since 1990 * Montceau-les-Mines, France, since 1993 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Göppingen (district)
title: Geislingen an der Steige
